mapper.sql: COURIER_NUMBER, SEND_TIME, CTM_NAME, CTM_BAR_CODE, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, ORDER_NUMBER, ADDRESSEE, PHONE, SHOP_NUMBER, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, FEE, GOODS, NUMBER_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SOURCE_IMPORT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SOURCE_IMPORT (COURIER_NUMBER, SEND_TIME, CTM_NAME, CTM_BAR_CODE, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, ORDER_NUMBER, ADDRESSEE, PHONE, SHOP_NUMBER, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, FEE, GOODS, NUMBER_TYPE ) values (#{courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into SOURCE_IMPORT
COURIER_NUMBER,
SEND_TIME,
CTM_NAME,

ADDRESS,
ORDER_NUMBER,
ADDRESSEE,
PHONE,

mapper.update:
update SOURCE_IMPORT
COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEND_TIME = #{record.sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CTM_NAME = #{record.ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_BAR_CODE = #{record.ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUMBER = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESSEE = #{record.addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_NUMBER = #{record.shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT = #{record.weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COURIER_COMPANY = #{record.courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOODS = #{record.goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUMBER_TYPE = #{record.numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update SOURCE_IMPORT set COURIER_NUMBER = #{record.courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEND_TIME = #{record.sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CTM_NAME = #{record.ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_BAR_CODE = #{record.ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROVINCE = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESSEE = #{record.addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{record.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NUMBER = #{record.shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{record.weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COURIER_COMPANY = #{record.courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS = #{record.goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUMBER_TYPE = #{record.numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SOURCE_IMPORT
SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CTM_NAME = #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTM_BAR_CODE = #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESSEE = #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_NUMBER = #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COURIER_COMPANY = #{courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOODS = #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUMBER_TYPE = #{numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where COURIER_NUMBER = #{courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SOURCE_IMPORT set SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CTM_NAME = #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTM_BAR_CODE = #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESSEE = #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NUMBER = #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COURIER_COMPANY = #{courierCompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS = #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUMBER_TYPE = #{numberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COURIER_NUMBER = #{courierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
